resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>71214</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/110139</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/110139</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Utrjevanje znanja (Word)</string>
            <string language="en">Brushing up knowledge (MS Word)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bürsten herauf Wissen (MS Wort)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Brossage vers le haut de la connaissance (MME. 
mot)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escovar acima do conhecimento (MS palavra)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spazzolando sulla conoscenza (MS parola)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βούρτσισμα επάνω στη γνώση (MS-WORD)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cepillar encima del conocimiento (MS palabra)</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec zna na medmrežju poiskati vsebine in jih vstaviti v dokument. Učenec zna številčiti strani in vstaviti kazalo v dokument. Učenec zna shranit v mapo dokument, odpirati, brisati in preimenovati Dokument, uporabiti velikosti, vrste in oblike pisav, uporabljati sloge Učenec zna uporabljati odložišče , nastavitve strani, poravnavo besedila. Učenec zna vstaviti sliko v dokument in zna spreminjati parametre slike. Učenec razume in zna uporabiti pridobljeno znanje pri oblikovanju dokumenta.</string>
            <string language="en">Organizing task for pupils that needs all previous knowledge of word processor (creating document, using/formatting styles and fonts, inserting images, numbering pages and creating table of contents).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">urejevalnik besedila</string>
            <string language="en">word processor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">microsoft word</string>
            <string language="en">microsoft word</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dokument</string>
            <string language="en">document</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">številčenje strani</string>
            <string language="en">page numbering</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kazalo</string>
            <string language="en">table of contents</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Organisierende Aufgabe für Pupillen, die alles 
vorhergehende Wissen des Textverarbeitungsgerätes benötigt 
(Dokument, using/formatting Arten und Schriftkegel herstellend, Bilder
einsetzend, Seiten numerierend und Inhaltsverzeichnis erstellend).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En organisant chargez pour des pupilles 
qui a besoin de toute la connaissance précédente de l'unité de 
traitement de texte (créant le document, les modèles 
d'using/formatting et les fontes, insérant des images, numérotant 
des pages et créant la table des matières).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tarefa organizando para as pupilas que necessita 
todo o conhecimento precedente do processador de palavra (que cría o 
original, os estilos de using/formatting e as pias batismais, 
introduzindo imagens, numerando páginas e criando o índice).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Operazione d'organizzazione per le pupille che ha
bisogno di tutta la conoscenza precedente del programma di trattamento
di testi (che crea documento, gli stili di using/formatting e le serie
complete di caratteri, inserente le immagini, numerante le pagine e 
creante indice).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οργανώνοντας τη στοιχειώδη εργασία για τους μαθητές 
που χρειάζεται όλη την προηγούμενη γνώση επεξεργαστή λέξεων 
(δημιουργώντας το έγγραφο, χρησιμοποιώντας/μορφή μορφοποίησης και
τύπος χαρακτήρων, παρεμβολή των εικόνων, αρίθμηση των σελίδων 
και δημιουργία του πίνακα περιεχομένων).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarea de ordenación para las pupilas que necesita
todo el conocimiento anterior del procesador de textos (que crea el 
documento, estilos de using/formatting y fuentes, insertando 
imágenes, numerando las paginaciones y creando índice).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textverarbeitungsgerät</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Microsoft Word</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dokument</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Seitennumerierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Inhaltsverzeichnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité de traitement de texte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Microsoft Word</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">document</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">numérotation de page</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">table des matières</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">processador de palavra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">palavra de microsoft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">original</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">numbering de página</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">índice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di trattamento di testi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">parola del microsoft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">documento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">numerazione di pagina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">indice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επεξεργαστής λέξεων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Microsoft Word</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έγγραφο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρίθμηση σελίδων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πίνακας περιεχομένων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">procesador de textos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Microsoft Word</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">documento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">enumeración de paginación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">índice</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
